title: Chris Travis on Falling Out with Xavier Wulf, The SHWB Break Up, Raider Klan Split & More
description:
Long time friend #ChrisTravis and #BankrollRico, accompanied by Trey Bands, made their way back to the No Jumper podcast to talk about everything that happened since the last time they linked up.

----
00:00 Intro
0:25 - Remembering meeting Adam for the first time while living in a filthy apartment
1:52 - Never expecting Raider Klan to blow up the way it did
5:25 - Never considering the Raider Klan a formal group
7:32 - Remembering the first Raider Klan tour. Learning how popular they were for the first time
10:00 - Chris Travis on deciding to stay in California and forming the SeshHollowWaterBoyz
11:05 - Tensions in the group started rising in 2017 after everyone had their own cribs
12:48 - Adam regrets not doing an interview with Chris in 2016
14:30 - Chris Travis explains how the group reacted when he left the Water Boyz
17:00 - Leaving the Raider Klan after Purp p*nched a journalist at The Fader
18:21 - Clashing with Wulf after Chris decided to leave Raider Klan
19:50 - Chris Travis on how back and forth with Xavier Wulf in 2018 started over a petty money dispute
22:20 - Wulf is known for sneak dissing and taking problems to Twitter
23:42 - Wulf claiming he made No Jumper and starting problems with Adam25:41 - Reacting to Xavier Wulf’s album under Atlantic while claiming independent
27:35 - Remembering the LA wave around Water Boyz
28:20 - The origins of cloud rap and early HAM shows
29:41 - Making the switch from gangster rap to cloud rap after moving from Memphis to Cali30:45 - Chris Travis on why he pulled up on Xavier Wulf during recent beef over a sample35:42 - Thoughts on Jeffrey and Wulf cliquing up during beef with Chris
37:40 - Chris on cutting ties after Jeffrey’s “R” song
41:27 - How Jeffrey stole Rico’s swag
42:54 - Chris on his current relationship with Eddy and Bones
43:55 - Adam explains why he thinks Wulf is a weirdo
44:45 - Rico remembers meeting Juice WRLD at No Jumper and hearing “Lucid Dreams” unreleased
45:40 - Exposing Xavier Wulf for being lame, doing dr*gs, being weird with girls
48:28 - Chris Travis on starting the “Water” trend after getting off lean
52:00 - Getting into it with Yung Gleesh over his “Water” song
52:44 - Chris checks Adam for shouting out Ugly God
54:48 - Rico’s new music. Being blood brothers with Chris
56:18 - Adam encourages Rico to take social media seriously and stay out of the streets
57:10 - Explaining to Adam how Memphis and Nashville are two different worlds
59:33 - Reacting to Young Dolph's passing 
1:00:20 - Adam remembers when Rico put him on to all the secrets of Gotti’s crew
1:01:36 - Shoutout to Glorilla and Hitkidd
1:01:45 - Rico spits some bars. Showing love to Adam. Tap in with Water Boyz En


---

NO JUMPER PATREON
http://www.patreon.com/nojumper

content:encoded:
Long time friend #ChrisTravis and #BankrollRico, accompanied by Trey Bands, made their way back to the No Jumper podcast to talk about everything that happened since the last time they linked up.


----

00:00 Intro

0:25 - Remembering meeting Adam for the first time while living in a filthy apartment

1:52 - Never expecting Raider Klan to blow up the way it did
